comment: Proof of ~ peirce from minimal implicational calculus, the axiomatic definition of disjunction ( ~ olc , ~ orc , ~ jao ), and Curry's axiom ~ curryax . (Contributed by BJ, 4-Apr-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
